title: cant launch after closing client
body:
hi,

When i reboot my computer I can login with no problem, but when I close the client and re open league, nothing happen after I click launch. I need to reboot my pc everytime to login. anyone having this problem? any fix? thank you

replies.body: I can't say for sure what could be causing this, it could be a bad network adapter or something else entirely.  To start off and help rule out possibilities, I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to configure your network.  This can help in cases of your connection becoming unresponsive at some point.  Hopefully, that will do the trick!
